ðŸ“– Summary: objcurses is a terminal-based 3D object viewer that renders .obj models using ASCII characters. It allows users to preview 3D files directly in the terminal, control the camera and lighting in real-time, and supports basic colors from .mtl files. This tool is useful for quickly previewing 3D models without launching a heavy editor.
